players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Bob's death is tragic. I think we should look closely at anyone who seems too quiet or evasive. Alice's silence is concerning—she might be hiding something."
Charlie: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and confirmed it. We need to act fast and vote her out to protect the town."
Charlie: "Diana has been proven to be the mafioso by my investigation last night. Voting her out now is our only chance to keep the town safe."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
